name: iS lime?
description:
This slime got stuck inside a dungeon for so long that it forgot what it was!

In this topdown roguelike, you play as a slime that can take equipments from other races and change itself. Be a mix of slime, human, elf or orc.

Will you escape the dungeon?

Movement: wasd or arrow keys
Attack: Space Bar

Submission of  "Mais uma Game Jam"

The open source code can be found at Github
